traceability.evidence: No code paths in bin/dry-aged-deps.js or src/ reference reading or parsing a `.dry-aged-deps.json` file; searches for the filename return no matches. No tests in the suite cover loading, merging, or validating a config file. README.md and documentation files do not mention `.dry-aged-deps.json` support.
traceability.notes: The config-file functionality specified by prompts/010.0-DEV-CONFIG-FILE-SUPPORT.md has not been implemented: there is no logic to locate, parse, validate, or merge a `.dry-aged-deps.json` file, no tests for it, and no documentation updates. All acceptance criteria remain unmet.
